feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: OData Services ABAP RESTful application programming model
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

 

I’m working on the S4D400 exercise where we create a subpackage  ZS4D400 and copy the table  /LRN/S4D400_APT to our own package.

However, I noticed that my main package S4D400 doesn’t exist in my ABAP environment.

Should I create this package manually, or is it supposed to be pre-delivered by the system?

I need some suggestions how to find that package. so that I can create the application.

Thanks in advance
Sumanth.

entry.title: Setting that indicates if UI labels come from DDIC or not
entry.content:
Hi.

For selection texts in reports it is possible to configure if the label displayed on UI comes from the DDIC or not.

I would like to know, if it is possible to get this information of an UI element in ABAP.
So, is a parameter configured like that or not.

I already inspected the screen structure but could not find an appropriate field that indicates where the label comes from.

BR

entry.title: Update new pricing after changing pricing condition record
entry.content:
Hello all,

Currently I am facing an issue that, I do an enhancement in USEREXIT_XKOMV_BEWERTEN_END to insert a new pricing condition into XKOMV table.
The copy works fine, however, from user expectation, some of the value should be updated. But this only happens if we access to VA02 manually, and click Update Pricing => G for specific item.
The update won't happen automatically in the background after copying.
Is there any way that I can do the update pricing = G in the USEREXIT_XKOMV_BEWERTEN_END?

Thank you for your time!

entry.title: REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY
entry.content:
Hello,

we have this issue "Number of entries" counter is not showing in the initial screen for  IW39, IW29, IH06, IH08 etc. After clicking refresh button it is appearing.

It is in function module REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY. 

When we check code, data are already there but as was mentioned not shown on initial screen. 

Is there any customizing setting?

entry.title: FM_FUNDS_CENTER_UPDATE updates tables in test mode
entry.content:
Function FM_FUNDS_CENTER_UPDATE is updating tables when run in uncommit mode , how to resolve this ?

IMPORTING
VALUE(I_FIKRS) LIKE  FMHISV-FIKRS
 VALUE(I_FLG_COMMIT) LIKE  FMDY-XFELD DEFAULT SPACE
TABLES
     T_FMMD_FMFCTR TYPE  FMMD_T_FMFCTR_CORE
      T_FMMD_FMFCTRT TYPE  FMMD_T_FMFCTRT_CORE
      T_FMMD_FMHISV TYPE  FMMD_T_FMHISV_CORE
 EXCEPTIONS
      ERROR_OCCURRED

entry.title: 403 Forbidden Error in BTP ABAP Trial Environment — Request Blocked by UCON
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

From the last 4-5 days i am facing the below issue: 

I  have connected BTP Trial account to Eclipse ADT. I don't have access to SAP GUI. While previewing the service url I am getting this error. I am frustrated from the last 4 days. Stuck to only this. can you please give me an appropriate solution. I have deleted the BTP trial account and generated a new instance still not resolved, even I have created a new workspace in Eclipse that also doesn't solve the issue. Previously I used to see the preview of the app and service url. I have attached the error screenshot below. Note: My BTP Trial account is still active. I'm using BAS and it's working perfectly.

entry.title: Check capacity - Putaway
entry.content:
Hello !

I’m new to EWM and I work as an ABAP developer.

My requirement is to transfer stock ( Hu ) from one bin to another. For example, if the source HU has a quantity of 250, and the destination bin already contains : one full pallet (150) and one partial pallet (100)

we expect that 50 units will go into the partial pallet to make it full. The remaining quantity should either stay in the same bin (if the bin can hold up to 3 pallets) or be placed in another bin. To achieve this, I’m implementing some logic in the capacity check BAdI, and I’m trying to create an ad-hoc product warehouse task (WT) directly inside the BAdI. Can anyone please advise if this approach is correct or even feasible? 

Thanks!

entry.title: Inquiry regarding Course for learning ABAP program
entry.content:
Dear experts,

I am subscribing the SAP learning Hub, and I would like to learng the ABAP program.

Could you inform me about the contents related the ABAP program in the SAP learning Hub.

Regards,

TENDO

entry.title: Get name of identifier
entry.content:
Hi,

how can I get the name of an identifier in ABAP?

 

DATA my_variable TYPE c.

DATA identifier_name TYPE string.

" fictive example
identifier_name = get_identifier( my_variable ).

" identifier_name should contain value my_varibale

 

Unfortunately I couldn't find any appropriate solution using RTTI.

 

BR

entry.title: Get information of actual parameters
entry.content:
Hi,

is it possible to retrieve information of actual parameters (arguments) in ABAP?

In my use case I want to know the identifier of the passed actual parameter of a method call.

Example:

...
METHODS do_anything
  IMPORTING
    parameter TYPE string.

...

METHOD do_anything
  DATA(name_of_actual_parameter) = get_name_actual_parameter( parameter ).
  " name_of_actual_parameter should contain as value my_variable
ENDMETHOD.

...

DATA my_variable TYPE string.
do_anything( parameter = my_variable ).

BR

entry.title: Get information of UI elements of dynpro / selection screen
entry.content:
Hi.

I need information of all existing UI elements in a dynpro / selection screen.

I need to know about selection parameters, select options, blocks, everything that is displayed on the UI.

As far as I can see the FM RS_REFRESH_FROM_SELECTOPTIONS and DYNP_VALUES_READ return only information about parameters and select options, but not about comments or blocks etc.

BR

entry.title: Output message triggered even if output ignored (requirement 0000902 not fulfilled)
entry.content:
Hello,

When an outbound delivery document is generated, we need to trigger an output type [which generates an IDoc]  for ZEOR.

For this purpose, we have created a routine 902 in our system. If the required conditions, fails then SY-SUBRC set as 4 else set as 0 to trigger the output type.

Currently we are facing a problem, even after setting SY-SUBRC as 4 in routine 902, output type ZEOR getting triggered.

I checked in the determination analysis and indeed the routine is not fulfilled and ignore the output message. But the status is green and the idoc is generated.

I have added my code both in FORM KOBEV_902 and FORM KOBED_902.

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Output message triggered even Output ignored (requirement 0000902 not fulfilled)
entry.content:
Hello,

When ever outbound delivery document is generated, we need to trigger an output type ZEOR [which generate an IDOC].

For this purpose, we have created a routine 902 in our system. If the required condition, mentioned above, fails then SY-SUBRC set as 4 else set as 0 to trigger the output type.

Currently we are facing a problem, even after setting SY-SUBRC as 4 in routine 902, output type ZEOR getting triggered.

I checked in determination analysis and indeed routine is not fulfilled and output message said ignored. But the status is green and the idoc is generated.

entry.title: Retrieve the task list operations for a specific material, similar to what SAP transaction CA03?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I hope you’re doing well!
I’m trying to retrieve the task list operations for a specific material, similar to what SAP transaction CA03 displays.

Here’s what I’ve done so far: Joined tables like MAPL, PLKO, PLFL, PLAS, and PLPO. (I tried also without PLFL)

What I noticed is that CA03 seems to show sometimes operations for task list type “S”.

Any advice on whether my approach is correct or if I need to consider something else?
Thanks a lot for your help!

 

CODE:
SELECT plpo.VORNR,
plpo.STEUS,
plpo.ARBID,
plpo.WERKS,
plpo.LTXA1,
plpo.BMSCH,
plpo.VGE01, plpo.VGW01,
plpo.VGE02, plpo.VGW02,
plpo.VGE03, plpo.VGW03
FROM MAPL mapl
JOIN PLKO plko
ON mapl.PLNTY = plko.PLNTY
AND mapl.PLNNR = plko.PLNNR
AND mapl.PLNAL = plko.PLNAL
AND mapl.MANDT = plko.MANDT
AND plko.LOEKZ = ''
JOIN PLFL plfl
ON plko.PLNTY = plfl.PLNTY
AND plko.PLNNR = plfl.PLNNR
AND plko.PLNAL = plfl.PLNAL
AND plko.MANDT = plfl.MANDT
AND plfl.LOEKZ = ''
JOIN PLAS plas
ON plfl.PLNTY = plas.PLNTY
AND plfl.PLNNR = plas.PLNNR
AND plfl.PLNFL = plas.PLNFL
AND plfl.PLNAL = plas.PLNAL
AND plfl.MANDT = plas.MANDT
AND plas.LOEKZ = ''
JOIN PLPO plpo
ON plas.PLNTY = plpo.PLNTY
AND plas.PLNNR = plpo.PLNNR
AND plas.PLNKN = plpo.PLNKN
AND plas.MANDT = plpo.MANDT
WHERE mapl.MANDT = '100'
AND mapl.MATNR = '<MATERIAL_NUMBER>'
AND mapl.WERKS = '<PLANT_CODE>'
AND plko.DATUV <= CURRENT_DATE
AND mapl.PLNNR = '<ROUTING_NUMBER>'
AND mapl.PLNAL = '<ALTERNATIVE_NUMBER>'
ORDER BY plpo.VORNR;

entry.title: Search for the BAdI to trigger a notification after saving a sales order
entry.content:
I am looking to identify the standard BAdI in SAP S/4HANA On-Premise that allows triggering an action after saving a sales order.
My goal is to implement an automatic email notification when a sales order is blocked. I want to avoid using the old User Exits such as USEREXIT_SAVE_DOCUMENT in MV45AFZZ and instead use a modern, BAdI-based approach.

entry.title: post method fails with "Unexpected text for XML-ABAP transformation"
entry.content:
Hi ALl,

I have a post method which calls a RFC fm and should display an xml output. I kept a debugger on create_deep_entity and I am able to see the xml in the export parameter (ev_xml_slsquote_data )of the RFC. 

However 

 return the data for response body
    TRY.
        CLEAR er_deep_entity.
        copy_data_to_ref(
          EXPORTING
            is_data = ev_xml_slsquote_data
          CHANGING
            cr_data = er_deep_entity ).

it fails in the below code.

entry.title: How to convert TLINE to XSTRING For Spool Request
entry.content:
Hi,

I'm having problems convert TLINE to XSTRING. I have a function module that converts spool request to PDF using CONVERT_OTFSPOOLJOB_2_PDF. The PDF output is in TLINE structure. Now I want to convert this into XSTRING to process is later on as an e-mail attachment. I was trying this fragment of code.

DATA: lv_pdf     TYPE string,
        lv_xpdf    TYPE xstring.

  LOOP AT pt_pdfin.
    CONCATENATE lv_pdf pt_pdfin-tdline INTO lv_pdf.
  ENDLOOP.

  CALL FUNCTION 'SCMS_STRING_TO_XSTRING'
    EXPORTING
      text           = lv_pdf
*     MIMETYPE       = ' '
*     ENCODING       =
   IMPORTING
     buffer         = lv_xpdf
   EXCEPTIONS
     failed         = 1
     OTHERS         = 2.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0. l
  ENDIF.

where pt_pfdin is the TLINE formated PDF.

But this isn't working. Any ideas? Thanks in advance

entry.title: Daily GBP Exchange Rate API for SAP TCURR
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Our client requested that we load daily exchange rates for the UK (GBP) into the SAP TCURR table.

They mentioned that exchange rates could be obtained from sources such as Reuters, Bloomberg, or XE.com, but since those APIs require paid subscriptions, we explored alternatives.

As a workaround, we managed to retrieve GBP rates from bankofengland.co.uk using HTML parsing, but the publication dates and overall data consistency are not very reliable for production use.

My question is, do you know or currently use any reliable and preferably free API to fetch daily GBP exchange rates that can be integrated with SAP?

Any suggestions or best practices would be highly appreciated.

Thank you in advance!

Best regards,
aatan.

entry.title: Issue with CBO App UI Not Visible After Moving to QA
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have created a Custom Business Object (CBO) and assigned a business catalog SAP_FIN_BC_SA_PER_PC  to it. In the development system, the app name was visible and working fine. However, after transporting it to the QA system, the “Generate UI” option is showing as disabled, and the app name is not visible.

All the related artifacts for the CBO have been moved to QA, and I have also tried re-importing the collection , but the issue still persists.

Could you please suggest what might be causing this issue or what steps I can take to resolve it?

Thanks in advance!
